header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Restaurants and food, work and future work plans, family and Mother’s Day, relationships.
header.activity: Friends talking while eating an evening meal.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, announcing, anecdote telling

speaker.fls: Imogen has just started French and Spanish at school. At this point she only knows a few dozen words of these languages -- level unspecified
